name: mathieu-stability
info:
# Ince-Strutt diagram for Mathieu equation

This simulation computes the ?[Ince-Strutt diagram](https://www.google.ru/#newwindow=1&q=Ince-Strutt+diagram) that shows stability region for the ?[Mathieu equation](/doc#box/Mathieu) in the plane of parameters $(\lambda, \delta)$.

The key component for the simulation is the ?[LinOdeStabChecker](/doc#box/LinOdeStabChecker) box.
definition: {"boxes":[{"name":"stabilityChecker","info":{"inputs":[{"name":"activator","help":"Activation port","pos":1.3},{"name":"solution","help":"ODE solution on period","pos":1.7}],"outputs":[{"name":"initState","help":"Initial state for ODE","pos":3.3},{"name":"result","format":[1],"help":"Stability check
